subject: Re: Complicated Junit Test
msgSnippet: Thanks for your help. But the thing is this is application that I am trying to test and they need something automated to run it. These microsoft documents can
messageBody:
Thanks for your help. But the thing is this is application that I
am trying to test and they need something automated to run it. These
microsoft documents can change with date and can remain same for
months. Everytime this document changes, there is a mail in my
mailbox having the document. I have made a test document in the
database, that everday its date changes so I get one document in my
mailbox, but with different date. But scanning a mailbox to find
one mail can be hard? The other properties I would like to test is
am i getting the right document back? A document can be sent in
various formats, like HTML, OR word. I want to make sure if the
format is right..I dont know how this is possible.. May be u can
help.. Thanks!!!
